verses.verse: And the <S%H376>men<s%> of Kiriath-jearim <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5927>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> on the <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> at Kiriath-jearim that the <S%H3117>time<s%> was <S%H7235>long,<s%> for it was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5091>lamented<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and the <S%H9441>Ashtaroth<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> you and <S%H3559>direct<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him <S%H905>alone;<s%> and He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"
So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> and the <S%H9441>Ashtaroth<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H905>alone.<s%>
Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6908>"Gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> and I will <S%H6419>pray<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for you."

And they <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> and <S%H8210>poured<s%> it out <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

Now when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> "Do not <S%H2790>cease<s%> to <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for us, that He may <S%H3467>save<s%> us from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2461>suckling<s%> <S%H2924>lamb<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it for a <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him.

Now <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H5927>offering<s%> up the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5066>drew<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and <S%H2000>confused<s%> them, so that they were <S%H5062>routed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out of <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H5221>down<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> Beth-car.

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> and <S%H8129>Shen,<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H72>Ebenezer,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2008>"Thus<s%> <S%H5704>far<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5826>helped<s%> us."

So the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued<s%> and they <S%H3254>did<s%> not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5750>anymore<s%> within the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7725>restored<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even to <S%H1661>Gath;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> their <S%H1366>territory<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> So there was <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

And he used to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H1767>annually<s%> <S%H8141><s%> on <S%H5437>circuit<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> and <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4725>places.<s%>

Then his <S%H8666>return<s%> [was] to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> for his <S%H1004>house<s%> [was] <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
